title: OJ HoFers for Sale prices lowered

posts.post_title: OJ HoFers for Sale prices lowered
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bruce Kasarda
The following Old Judge HoFer cards are for sale/trade. 

Mcphee     GAI Auth    (sold)
Nichols    GAI Auth    (Sold)
Beckley    SGC Auth     550(trim?)(Hold)
Ewing      SGC 30       (Sold)
Thompson   SGC 10       sold
Keefe      SGC 10       sold
Clarkson   SGC 10       sold
McCarthy   SGC 10       sold
Griffith   SGC 40       sold
O'Rourke   GAI Auth     sold

Scans are available on request. Thanks bruce kasarda
